task.title: Write to Trash
task.shortdesc: To wrap up the extended tutorial, let's use the Trash destination as a placeholder for a destination system to be determined later.

context.p: The Trash destination deletes any records that pass to it. This allows you to complete a pipeline in development so you can test the pipeline without writing data to to a production system.

If you prefer, you can use the Hadoop FS destination to write to file as we did earlier in the tutorial, or you can use another destination to write to a development destination system available to you.
The Trash destination requires no configuration, so just add it to the canvas and connect the Expression Evaluator to it:
